description: A directional vote on a forum topic or reply. Votes are quantitative (ranking); reactions are expressive (emoji-style).

main.description: Record containing a directional vote on a forum topic or reply.

subject.description: The topic or reply being voted on.

direction.description: Vote direction. Start upvote-only; 'down' can be added later without breaking change.

community.description: DID of the community where this vote was cast. Immutable origin identifier.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this vote was originally created.
